channel.title: Recoil Rift [Project]
channel.description:
Hmm, I haven't released anything in a while; and I got quite bored with my project client/server.
Nothing too special, mostly interfaces/server-sided buttons/quick prayers. I tried to keep Sprites organized based on their usages. not all mapdata/items are cache-packed.
Features: RuneScape's mouses (eating, attacking, teleporting, ancient spells, etc)
[img]http://img546.imageshack.us/img546/4320/0003oc.png[/img] [img]http://img641.imageshack.us/img641/9503/0001rm.png[/img] [img]http://img231.imageshack.us/img231/4615/0002mo.png[/img] [img]http://img836.imageshack.us/img836/5285/0000uh.png[/img] [img]http://img580.imageshack.us/img580/8044/0004a.png[/img] [img]http://img196.imageshack.us/img196/7568/0005d.png[/img] [img]http://img41.imageshack.us/img41/1128/0006c.png[/img] [img]http://img267.imageshack.us/img267/7928/0008q.png[/img] [img]http://img64.imageshack.us/img64/5686/0010h.png[/img]
Link : [url=http://dl.dropbox.com/u/33250872/Package.rar]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/33250872/Package.rar[/url] enjoy. don't worry about it being remvoed I don't plan on it.
Note: Theres no 600+ data, 474 items, a 'few custom items' and some 500+ animations. This is an unfinished project, rip what you want/continue with it I dont care.
OBS!:This is not my project !... i just post it for who want to start new Stable Server ! Great Pking Server ;) Enjoy.
I got permission to upload this so stop be haters! [quote=":Taco:"]Lol it's my work, I gave him permission to release it here.
http://prntscr. com/4gnpx
Note: I will be working on a newer version with server-sided edits and some newer interfaces.[/quote]
Credits Cody' 100%
